info.title: Controle de Caixa API
info.description: Essa é a API de Controle de Caixa, que pode ser utilizada junto com a aplicação para controle de caixa de pequenos négocios

post.description: This route will be responsible for register a product

get.description: This route will be responsible for return a list of products
This route will be responsible for return a product by ID

put.description: This route will be responsible for update a product by ID

delete.description: This route will be responsible for delete a product by ID

post.description: This route will be responsible for register a product category

get.description: This route will be responsible for return a list of categories
This route will be responsible for return a product category by ID

put.description: This route will be responsible for update a product category by ID

delete.description: This route will be responsible for delete a product category by ID

post.description: This route will be responsible for register an user

get.description: This route will be responsible for return a list of users
This route will be responsible for return an user by ID

put.description: This route will be responsible for update an user by ID

delete.description: This route will be responsible for delete an user by ID

post.description: This route will be responsible for register an profile

get.description: This route will be responsible for return a list of profiles
This route will be responsible for return an profile by ID

put.description: This route will be responsible for update an profile by ID

delete.description: This route will be responsible for delete an profile by ID

post.description: This route will be responsible for register an user address

get.summary: Return a list of user address
get.description: This route will be responsible for return a list of user address
This route will be responsible for return an user address by ID

put.description: This route will be responsible for update an user address by ID

delete.description: This route will be responsible for delete an user address by ID

post.description: This route will be responsible for register a sale

get.description: This route will be responsible for return a list of sales
This route will be responsible for return a sale by ID

put.description: This route will be responsible for update a sale by ID

delete.description: This route will be responsible for delete a sale by ID

post.summary: Register the cashie of the day
post.description: This route will be responsible for register a cashie of the day

get.description: This route will be responsible for return a list of cashies
This route will be responsible for return a cashie by ID

put.description: This route will be responsible for update a product cashie by ID

delete.description: This route will be responsible for delete a cashie by ID
